entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
